titles.title: Great is the Lord, He is holy and just

properties.copyright: 1982 Meadowgreen Music Company (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord, He is holy and just.
By His power we trust in His love.
Great is the Lord, He is faithful and true.
By His mercy He proves He is love.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord and worthy of glory.
Great is the Lord and worthy of praise.
Great is the Lord, now lift up your voice,
Now lift up your voice, great is the Lord.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Great are You Lord and worthy of glory.
Great are You Lord and worthy of praise.
Great are You Lord, I lift up my voice,
I lift up my voice, great are You, Lord.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Great are You, Lord.
Great are You, Lord.
Great are You, Lord.
Great are You, Lord.
